issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Dear TM developers,

could CFNetwork framework (from CoreServices) be added to default titanium mobile template, in next release(s) ?

It's very useful to handle low level sockets; actually I had to recompile titanium mobile adding this framework in order to make my custom project module work :(

Having it already added in next releases, will help me saving a lot work next time you will release a new TM version ;)

{html}
fields.summary: Adding CFNetwork to default titanium mobile installation template

comments.body:
{html}

(from [6f286fda872f1e0e31b6865225f48a87eb8b757b]) [#193 state:resolved] added CFNetwork to base project frameworks http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/6f286fda872f1...

{html}
